** translation of describtion **

Second World War, seawar. Some shipwrecked men have been picked up amongst whom also a boy wearing a safetyjacket. Location unknown, 1941

comment.author: 49503090841@N01
comment._content: WWII: War at sea. Some men from a shipwreck have been saved. One boy is wearing a life-jacket. Location unknown. 1941 -- Seen on your photo stream. (?)
